backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with data types for users, content, media, notifications, settings, activity logs, and live polls, along with in‑memory maps and authorization/storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs for traceability.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten short summaries of many frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme file defining OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/README.md: Frontend README explaining project features, development setup, authentication flow, admin access, and live poll management.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling hash-based routing, non-blocking decommission status checks, and top-level error boundary.
frontend/src/assets/generatedAssets.ts: Exports constants for generated static asset paths such as logo and background images.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: UI card shown to non-admin users explaining lack of admin permissions with a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAuthE: Displays admin authentication error details with retry and home-navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminModul: Selects and renders the appropriate admin module view based on the activeModule prop.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Guards admin routes by checking identity and admin status, showing loading, errors, or access-denied states as needed.
frontend/src/components/admin/common/Adm: Generic searchable data table component that renders columns dynamically and displays empty-state messaging.
frontend/src/components/admin/common/Del: Reusable confirmation dialog for delete actions with loading support.
frontend/src/components/admin/common/For: Displays a small validation error message with an icon.
frontend/src/components/admin/jobs/JobFo: Form for creating or editing a job posting with validation and backend mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/jobs/JobsL: Lists all jobs with search, edit, and delete actions, using a data table and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/media/Medi: Displays media files with search, filtering, preview, and delete capabilities.
Modal dialog to preview images or PDFs and download media files.
Component for selecting, validating, and uploading media files with progress tracking and error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Ba: Displays backup download tools and tabs for viewing activity logs and login history.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Da: Shows dashboard metrics, recent activity, and a refreshable overview of system statistics.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Jo: Provides job listing management with dialogs for creating and editing jobs.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Me: Renders media upload tools and a list of uploaded media items.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Ne: Manages creation and editing of news articles with a list and form dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/No: Offers notification composition and history viewing through tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Re: Displays the reports and analytics dashboard for viewing statistics.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Sc: Provides listing and form dialogs for creating and editing government schemes.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Us: Manages user accounts with creation, editing, and detailed viewing support.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/Vo: Allows viewing and editing voting results with a form dialog for new entries.
frontend/src/components/admin/modules/We: Displays website settings form with logo picker and loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/admin/news/Featu: Dialog for searching, filtering, and selecting a featured image from media items.
frontend/src/components/admin/news/NewsF: News creation and editing form handling validation, image selection, and submit mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/news/NewsL: Displays searchable news list with edit, publish, and delete actions using admin mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/notificati: Form to compose and send notifications to all users or selected users with validation.
Shows a list of past notifications with delivery status and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/admin/reports/Re: Dashboard showing user/news stats and provides CSV export for users and news.
frontend/src/components/admin/schemes/Do: Dialog for filtering, selecting, and returning PDF/document media items from the media library.
frontend/src/components/admin/schemes/Sc: Form component for creating or updating schemes with validation, document selection, and mutation handling.
Lists all schemes with search, edit, and delete actions using a data table and confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/admin/security/A: Displays all admin activity logs in a table with timestamps, principals, and activity details.
frontend/src/components/admin/security/B: Provides a button to export and download a full system backup with loading state.
frontend/src/components/admin/security/L: Shows login and logout events filtered from admin activities in a tabular format.
frontend/src/components/admin/settings/L: Dialog for selecting and saving a website logo from uploaded image media.
frontend/src/components/admin/settings/W: Form for editing website settings including name, contact info, SEO fields, and logo selector trigger.
frontend/src/components/admin/users/User: Drawer displaying detailed user info with role assignment and edit action.
Modal form for creating or editing a user with validation and submission via user mutations.
Displays all users in a searchable table with actions for viewing, editing, toggling status, and deleting.
frontend/src/components/admin/voting-res: Dialog form for adding or editing voting results with validation and create/update mutations.
Lists voting results with search, deletion, and metadata display including timestamps and total count.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: Global React error boundary that shows a fallback UI with reload option and error details.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginFooter: Footer showing About, Privacy Policy, and Contact buttons plus a copyright line.
frontend/src/components/auth/MemberLogin: Login card allowing members to enter mobile or password and request OTP, navigating to the dashboard on submit.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Main dashboard layout handling navbar, sidebar, mobile toggle, and content switching between user and admin modes.
Renders the main dashboard widgets including welcome section, profile progress, quick stats, and recent activities.
Top navigation bar providing search, notifications, user menu, and logout handling with identity and role data.
Right-side panel showing quick links and a list of recent announcements with priority badges.
Collapsible sidebar displaying user or admin navigation items and handling active selection and mobile overlay behavior.
frontend/src/components/notifications/No: Notification button with unread badge count that triggers opening the notification panel.
Slide-in notification panel that lists user notifications, supports marking items read, and handles keyboard/overlay closing.
Error boundary that shows a small fallback message if the notification panel fails to render.
frontend/src/components/site/BrandLogo.t: Displays a logo image with size variants and a styled fallback if loading fails.
frontend/src/components/site/ComingSoonR: Shows a ribbon announcing upcoming Gram Pradhan voting results with styled card and badge.
frontend/src/components/site/LivePollAdm: Provides admin controls to create, update, or reset a live poll with candidate management and duration settings.
frontend/src/components/site/LivePollRes: Renders a responsive bar chart of poll results with memoized colors and custom tooltip styling.
frontend/src/components/site/LivePollWid: Displays poll status, voting interface, countdown timer, results chart, and admin panel for live polls.
frontend/src/components/site/LiveVotingR: Fetches and displays live village voting results in a table with loading and error states.
Shows a footer with branding, support email, copyright, and promotional link.
Wraps page content with a main container and footer layout structure.
frontend/src/components/site/TextLogo.ts: Displays a stylized text logo with size and color variants.
frontend/src/components/site/VotingPromo: Combines live poll and voting results sections inside a styled promotional layout.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/dashboard.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch dashboard metrics, recent activity, and monthly growth from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/jobs.ts: Provides React Query hooks to fetch and manage jobs including create, update, and delete operations with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/media.ts: Implements hooks to fetch media and upload or delete media files, supporting upload progress and cache refresh.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/news.ts: Contains hooks for retrieving, creating, updating, publishing, and deleting news items with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/notifications.t: Adds hooks for sending notifications to users and fetching the notifications history.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/schemes.ts: Defines hooks to get, create, update, and delete government schemes via actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/security.ts: Provides hooks to fetch admin activity logs and export system backups as downloadable JSON.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/settings.ts: Contains hooks to load and update website settings using a fixed settings ID.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/useAdminAuth.ts: Handles retrieval of the caller’s user role and admin status with caching and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/users.ts: Implements hooks to list, retrieve, create, update, delete, and manage roles/status of users.
frontend/src/hooks/admin/votingResults.t: Provides hooks to manage voting results including fetch, create, update, and delete operations.
frontend/src/hooks/livePoll.ts: Defines hooks for live poll status, results, voting, poll management, and periodic polling.
frontend/src/hooks/notifications.ts: Supplies hooks to get user-specific notifications and mark them as read.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, recreating it on identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useExampleNotificatio: Empty placeholder hook file for future notification features.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity restoration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder for future React Query hooks with no current implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSystemStatus.ts: Queries backend availability by calling a lightweight method and infers whether the system is decommissioned.
frontend/src/hooks/votingResults.ts: Fetches all voting results from the backend with periodic polling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom theme variables for colors, layout, and UI components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard within a route guard using the main dashboard layout.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Provides an Internet Identity login flow for admins and navigates to the admin dashboard on success.
frontend/src/pages/DecommissionedPage.ts: Static page informing users that the website and its services are permanently decommissioned.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the main landing page with hero content, navigation buttons, notifications, and promotional sections.
frontend/src/pages/MemberLoginPage.tsx: Shows the member login screen with branding, background imagery, and a login card component.
frontend/src/pages/UserDashboardPage.tsx: Renders the user dashboard using the shared dashboard layout in non-admin mode.
frontend/src/utils/adminAuthError.ts: Normalizes backend admin authorization errors into user-friendly messages and detects authorization errors.
frontend/src/utils/hashRouting.ts: Provides hash-based page routing utilities to parse, convert, and update URL hashes for navigation.
frontend/src/utils/pollErrors.ts: Maps common poll-related backend errors to readable UI messages and identifies authentication-related poll errors.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Converts between nanoseconds and milliseconds and calculates formatted or structured time remaining until a given timestamp.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles URL and session-based parameter retrieval, persistence, and cleanup for routing and state management.
frontend/src/utils/userRole.ts: Checks whether a user role is admin and converts role enums into readable labels.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, typography, animations, and utility presets.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, issues, and requirements for the Smart Janghai project.
